Name: Tall
Description: This person is taller than most people.

Name: Short
Description: This person is shorter than most people.

Name: Giant
Description: This person is taller than almost everyone.

Name: Tiny
Description: This person is shorter than almost everyone.

Name: Ugly
Description: This person is uglier than most people.

Name: Beautiful
Description: This person is more attractive than most people.

Name: Good
Description: Good people have extra chances to do good, and sometimes can't be evil.

Name: Evil
Description: Evil people have extra chances to do evil, and sometimes can't do good.

Name: Hardworking
Description: A hard worker has a slight boost to general productivity at work.

Name: Lazy
Description: Being lazy makes life a lot harder. Thankfully you can always just become a NEET.

Name: Introverted
Description: Introverts make friends and get to know people more slowly, but gain levels at self improvement and personal hobbies more quickly.

Name: Extraverted
Description: Extraverts make friends more quickly, but require more time to improve themselves and at hobbies.

Name: Lucky
Description: Being lucky does very little unless you're playing games.

Name: Unlucky
Description: Being unlucky makes your life harder with no upsides. What did you expect?

Name: Frugal
Description: A frugal person will save money and pay less for almost everything.

Name: Extravagant
Description: An extravagant person is compelled to spend extra on almost everything they buy, but they'll look cool doing it.

Name: Heavy Sleeper
Description: A heavy sleeper gets by on less sleep without penalty.

Name: Light Sleeper
Description: A light sleeper wakes often at night and requires more sleep every day to be well rested.

Name: Neat
Description: A neat person has a higher minimum comfortable cleanliness level, and won't be happy in a house below that level.

Name: Slob
Description: A slob has a lower minimum comfortable cleanliness level. Potentially even 0. While it saves a lot of effort for them, it can be detrimental to their family.

name: Vampire
description: A being that lives off the lifeforce of others.

name: Close to Father
description: You were Best Friends with your Father. Relationship growth with your own children +30%

name: Distant Father
description: You hardly knew your father. Relationship growth with your own children -30%

Name: Nurturing
Description: Nurturing people want to take care of others. They like the idea of being helpful and a benefit to those in need.

Name: Hates Kids
Description: Some people hate kids. This person does, too.

Name: Perceptive
Description: A perceptive person lives in constant frustration as the world around themselves fail to notice what is plain to see.

Name: Grumpy
Description: Grumpy people are hard to get to know, and they tend to be slower at getting to know others, too.

Name: Friendly
Description: Friendly people are easy to get to know, and tend to be faster at getting to know others.

Name: Ambitious
Description: Ambitious people are always reaching for the next step in their life. They know what they want and they will work towards those goals.

Name: Content
Description: Content people are happy with how things are now. It's harder for them to rise above their rank, but they're also happier in general.
